work: Epistle to the Son of the Wolf
author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: حدّثنا عبد العزيز بن عبد السّلام عن النّبيّ - صلّی اللّه عليه و سلّم - انّه قال انّ عکّاء مدينة بالشّام قد اختصّها اللّه برحمته *
translation: ‘Abdu’l-‘Azíz, son of Abdu'-Salam, hath related unto us that the Prophet - may the blessings of God and His salutations be upon him - hath said: "‘Akká is a city in Syria to which God hath shown His special mercy."
